title: Person(s) having legal rights in any land required for URS under this Regulation shall be offered (1) consideration for the entitled area (1) of land as provided hereinafter
clause_text: Person(s) having legal rights in any land required for URS under this Regulation shall be offered (1) consideration for the entitled area (1) of land as provided hereinafter.
section: Consideration for Land falling under URS -
